Services.name: Vehicle Inquiries
Services.text: You can get the details of a registered vehicle through this service.

Services.name: Swap Deals
Services.text: You can exchange your old vehicle with our brand new one.

Services.name: Test Drive
Services.text: If you are thinking about buying your new vehicle, you can get a test drive from us.

Testimonials.text: Big thanks to Vehicle Solution car sale.I have purchased Mazda 3 from them and I had a great experience. And also amazed by their friendly customer service and flawless business at the entire time and I highly recommend Vehicle Solution for car buyers.
Testimonials.name: Mr.Sanjana Perera

Testimonials.text: Brilliant Service from Vehicle Solution.Recently me and my family had been trying to find the right van for us.Finally we found them and really impressed by whole business process.Even they gave us an amazing test run.We were relaxed and painless all throughout..Thanks a bunch!
Testimonials.name: Mr.Yasara Wickramasinghe

Testimonials.text: Worth our 70 mile journey to the Vehicle Solution car sale ! No pressure to the customers. And our all questions are well explained and answered.The staff is highly professional and knowledgeable,Reasonable prices, And massive thanks to them and recommend to the all needers.
Testimonials.name: Mr.Ravindu Sathsara

Testimonials.text: I have bought second hand Renegade.The jeep was well presented and even they gave me a service history which we don't get normally.From website to the purchase the whole process was outstanding.Thank you for the amazing experience.
Testimonials.name: Ms.Nihinsa Rajapakshe

Testimonials.text: After a lots of disspointment with well known car sale finally I am relived with Vehicle Solution car sale.Hassle free from inquiry to the purchase. I was able to clear all of my doubts without any pressure and the test drive that they offer was a pleasure.Hope to visit again in near future  And without hesitation recommend to the others.
Testimonials.name: Mr.Anosh Fernando

Testimonials.text: The Top notch service that I ever had ! As a women I had lack of knowledge about automobiles.But this is incredible,they have filled me with all the knowledge that I needed.5 star from me to the Vehicle Solution.
Testimonials.name: Ms.Oshini Nawarathna
